summary:
This is conversion for Sevenbase Bombshell body.
Weight slider supported.
descriptionHtml:
This is conversion for Sevenbase Bombshell body.

Weight slider supported.

Requires:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13363/?]Mini Sage Outfit for UNP[/URL] by Tsuke76
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/URL] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity

[URL=http://imgbox.com/7UvNq4AS][IMG]http://i.imgbox.com/7UvNq4AS.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13363/?]Mini Sage Outfit for UNP[/URL] first then overwrite the files.

There are two optional retexture files:
[URL=http://imgbox.com/ATwvAvPQ][IMG]http://i.imgbox.com/ATwvAvPQ.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Retexture installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Extract the contents of the archive in your Skyrim Data folder
2. When asked to override, click Yes


How to get it:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Console: help mini (items: "Mini Sage", "Mini Skirt" and "Mini Panty")
- OR -
Location: see original mod


Credits:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tsuke76 for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13363/?]Mini Sage Outfit for UNP[/URL]
Caliente for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/URL]
Crosscrusade, DeMoNhUnTeR1986, Sevennity for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/URL]
author: platinumblonde
